mapper.update:
update TD_SCHEDULER_TASK set
name=#{name},
code=#{code},
azkaban_project_name=#{azkabanProjectName},
azkaban_project_id=#{azkabanProjectId},
azkaban_project_version=#{azkabanProjectVersion},
azkaban_job_flow_id=#{azkabanJobFlowId},
azkaban_job_flow_version=#{azkabanJobFlowVersion},
status=#{status},
create_by=#{createBy},
creator=#{creator},
update_by=#{updateBy},
create_time=#{createTime},
update_time=#{updateTime},
tenant_id=#{tenantId},
data_app_id=#{dataAppId},
system_code=#{systemCode},
description=#{description},
where id=#{id}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from TD_SCHEDULER_TASK
AND id IN(SELECT MAX(id) FROM TD_SCHEDULER_TASK GROUP BY CODE, azkaban_project_name) AND azkaban_project_version IN(SELECT MAX(azkaban_project_version) FROM TD_SCHEDULER_TASK GROUP BY azkaban_project_name)
and tenant_id in
#{item}
select count(1) from TD_SCHEDULER_TASK where id in (select max(id) from TD_SCHEDULER_TASK group by code, azkaban_project_name) and (tenant_id is null or tenant_id = '')
select from TD_SCHEDULER_TASK where id = (select max(id) from TD_SCHEDULER_TASK where code = #{code} and azkaban_project_name = #{azkabanProjectName})

SELECT DISTINCT NAME, CODE FROM ( SELECT id,NAME as name, CODE as code FROM TD_SCHEDULER_TASK WHERE id IN(SELECT MAX(id) FROM TD_SCHEDULER_TASK GROUP BY CODE, azkaban_project_name) AND azkaban_project_version IN(SELECT MAX(azkaban_project_version) FROM TD_SCHEDULER_TASK GROUP BY CODE, azkaban_project_name)
and tenant_id in
#{item}
ORDER BY CONVERT(NAME USING GBK), CODE) t
